## Diff type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type Diff<A, B> = StrictExclude<A | B, A & B>
```
<b>References:</b> [StrictExclude](./types-kit.strictexclude.md)

## Example


```ts
// Expect: '2' | '3'
type Foo = Diff<'1' | '2', '1' | '3'>
```
